name: Willie Cauley-Stein
description:
If you picked Kentucky in your NCAA tournament bracket:

You did so because they are the overwhelming favorite...

You did so because they did not lose a game in the regular season...

You did so because they constantly turnover their roster yet come out on top...

You did so because John Calipari is one of the best coaches in the game...

You did so because their starting five could all become NBA players...

You did so because you are a life-long fan of Ashley Judd...

You did so because you found out that Kentucky star Willie Cauley-Stein is part Jewish!?
